name: Widow Jane 10 Year Bourbon
description: Hand assembled in Brooklyn using the richest & rarest straight bourbons, only ever in 5 barrel batches, non-chill filtered & proofed with our own mineral water from the legendary Rosendale Mines of NY.
tastingNotes: Nose of vanilla, cinnamon, nutmeg, cream. On the palate, orange, maple, cherry, almond. Finish is charred oak, spice.

name: Widow Jane 10 Year Never Walk Alone Bourbon
description: Hand assembled in Brooklyn using the richest & rarest straight bourbons, only ever in 5 barrel batches, non-chill filtered & proofed with our own mineral water from the legendary Rosendale Mines of NY. 100% of the profits of every bottle of this distiller’s choice high proof limited edition between the USBG Foundation’s Bartender Emergency Assistance Program & CORE F&B employee programs
tastingNotes: Nose of vanilla, cinnamon, nutmeg, cream. On the palate, orange, maple, cherry, almond. Finish is charred oak, spice.

name: Widow Jane - The Vaults 15 Year
description: Widow Jane The Vaults Aged 15 Years is a small batch blend of 15 to 17-year-old bourbon that’s been finished in Appalachian oak casks that were air-seasoned for five years. The Vaults is a hand-selected limited release of Widow Jane’s rarest and oldest bourbons, with the barrels from this 2020 release coming from Indiana and Tennessee.
tastingNotes: Nose of Broken in Leather, Sassafras, Birch Beer, Wintergreen. On the palate, Tobacco, Vanilla, Lemon, Brown Sugar, Cocoa Powder, Mint. Finish Cherry, Nutmeg, Honey, Vanilla

name: Widow Jane Decadence
description: We took some of our legendary 10 year old Bourbons & finished them in barrels that held New York’s finest artisanal maple syrup from Crown Maple®.
tastingNotes: Nose of sugared pecans, maple, birch beer, charred oak. On the palate, vanilla, burnt sugar, cinnamon bark. Finish brown sugar, shortbread, mellow tobacco & old whiskey.

name: Widow Jane American Oak Rye
description: Distilled from a Rye Mash is at least two years old. Mostly rye grain and a touch of barley, this rye is a spicy summer rye and makes some great cocktails. A good bitter, or a splash of vermouth or ginger beer goes a long way.
tastingNotes: Nose of clover honey, orange peel, tea. On the palate, brown sugar, white pepper, rye grain. Finish of dried peach, almond biscuit

name: Widow Jane Oak & Applewood Rye
description: From the same starting point as our Oak Rye aged in a once-used 10-year bourbon barrel, we wanted to extend the flavor profile of our rye distillate into a new profile, that would make a soothing and fruity rye compared to traditional ryes. To do so we add fresh cut Applewood Staves alongside the oak
tastingNotes: Nose of vanilla, cinnamon, nutmeg, cream. On the palate, orange, maple, cherry, almond. Finish is charred oak, spice.
